reasoning_log: The dataset provided 10 descriptions and 10 images, resulting in a perfect 1:1 mapping with no redundant images. The matching was primarily based on identifying unique architectural features and room types: Images 1-4 depict the various angles of the high-ceiling living room and mezzanine structure (Desc_1, Desc_2, Desc_3, Desc_4). Images 5 and 9 were distinguished by the presence (Desc_5/Image_5) or absence (Desc_9/Image_9) of the toilet in the frame. Images 6 and 7 were confirmed as the upper-level dining/kitchen (Desc_6) and the ground-level main kitchen adjacent to the stairs (Desc_7), respectively, identifiable by the dark green cabinets and layout. Image 8 was uniquely identified by the extensive wooden built-in storage (Desc_8), and Image 10 was clearly the indoor parking garage (Desc_10) due to the rolling doors and floor stains.

matching_result_list.evidence: Shows the high ceiling (挑高空間), internal stairs, and the built-in dark TV cabinet (內建電視矮櫃) against the wood-paneled wall.
A wide-angle view of the open space, showing the speckled quartz tile floor (地坪耐磨石英磚) and the general layout from a different perspective than Image 1.
An upward-looking shot (仰角) clearly showing the mezzanine railing (樓中樓欄杆) and the ceiling structure above, consistent with ultra-high floor description.
Wide view capturing the high ceiling, mezzanine, open stairs, and the white walls/ceiling with visible ceiling spotlights (頂部崁燈).
Bathroom featuring a toilet (有馬桶) and an integrated pedestal sink (一體成型洗臉台) in a traditional wet bath setting.
Shows the upper level (夾層) with the railing (欄杆臨空設計), open kitchen/dining area, floor tiles, and included dining table/chairs.
Main kitchen view showing the I-shaped counter, appliances, fully tiled walls, and the staircase immediately adjacent to the kitchen area (樓梯緊鄰廚房).

tag_list: 抽油煙機與瓦斯爐具齊全

matching_result_list.evidence: Large room defined by extensive built-in wooden storage cabinets (木作收納櫃豐富) and wood-look flooring (地板木紋).
Bathroom view showing the sink and wet shower space, but the toilet is not visible (無馬桶畫面), matching the description.
Unmistakable indoor parking garage with large columns, multiple rolling doors (捲門設計), and visible water stains on the concrete floor (地面有積水痕跡).
